question: Which Atlanta Braves player won the National League Most Valuable Player award in 1991, leading the team to its first division title since relocating to Atlanta?
answer: Terry Pendleton won the National League Most Valuable Player award in 1991.
raw_content:
Question: Which Atlanta Braves player won the National League Most Valuable Player award in 1991, leading the team to its first division title since relocating to Atlanta?  
Answer: Terry Pendleton won the National League Most Valuable Player award in 1991.
